pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This ebuild is fetch restricted, meaning that you must manually download the archive.
Minimum requirements can be found at:
https://support.google.com/earth/answer/21955?hl=en#zippy=%2Clinux-system-configuration

use.flag: Use the system's Expat library instead of the internal bundled version.
Use the system's FFmpeg instead of the internal bundled version.
Use the system's GPSBabel instead of the internal bundled version.
Use the system's ICU library instead of the internal bundled version.
Use the system's GDAL library instead of the internal bundled version.
Use the system's OpenSSL instead of the internal bundled version.
Use the system's Qt5 libraries instead of the internal bundled version.
Use the system's spnav libraries instead of the internal bundled version.
